item.title: Bash scripting to compare chat logs of an IRC channel
item.description: Table of Contents Summary Preliminary notes: Plan Simple case Including variables for url prefix, start id and end id Figuring out a larger range Implementing a simple conditional statement Implementing the for loop for a range > 500 Adding some functions and other minor streamlining Enabling the script to be called with parameters Comparing logs for range 9998683 to 1000000 Concluding remarks References
